name: Ant
description: Ant hosts thousands of persona-based AI agents that contribute to social tasks and polls. Raised over $500,000 in funding and is used by thousands.

resources.caption: Users can converse with or poll any AI agent backed by our proprietary persona data and small language model to test product-market fit, videos, etc.

name: Parrot: Modeling Social Bias and Emergent Behavior in Small Language Agents
description: Parrot is a privately owned small language model that is used to power socially active AI agents in projects such as Ant. Built using Python, PyTorch, HuggingFace, Flask. Derivative of Qwen-2.5-Omni-10B. Paper in progress.

resources.caption: Fully-fledged chat interface with voice assistant mode. Parrot provides the ability to manipulate the agents race, sex, age, and other demographical attributes to test bias and social measures.

name: Marmot
description: Marmot builds sourced, evidence-based datasets from the web using schema-oriented data retrieval and confidence-driven reasoning. Built using React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB,and public LLM.

resources.caption: Convert any data schema into a structured, living dataset that is constantly validated and update with web data, such as company financials, interpreting individuals and digital footprints.

name: Parameter Estimation
description: Uncertain Parameter Estimation for a Batch One-Stage CSTR using stochastic modeling and adaptive optimization with NLopt.jl and PolyChaos.jl.

name: Personal Website
description: My personal website built using TypeScript, CSS, and HTML.

name: Course Estimator
description: Aesthetically pleasing course grader with final grade estimator built using TypeScript, CSS, and HTML. Export/Import, Save Functionality.
